scenario: Inseego Corp. (Nasdaq: INSG) has launched its next generation 5G outdoor CPE, the Inseego Wavemaker 5G Outdoor CPE FW3000. The device supports 5G Sub-6 GHz and 4G LTE Cat 20 with 4x4 MIMO, providing high-speed connectivity with download speeds up to 5 Gbps. Key features include high-gain, integrated directional antennas, enterprise-grade security, and durability with an IP67 rating. The FW3000 is designed for businesses in both urban and rural areas and is FIPS 140-2 certified and TAA compliant, meeting stringent security and trade compliance standards. It also features a 2.5 Gbps PoE port for easy installation and the Inseego Mobile App for optimal signal placement. The device is built with the Snapdragon X65 5G Modem-RF System and utilizes UL-MIMO technology to boost uplink performance. Inseego Corp. is the industry leader in 5G Enterprise cloud WAN solutions, with millions of end customers and thousands of enterprise and SMB customers on its 4G, 5G, and cloud platforms.
